entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who lives in Hogwarts. He is described as bobbing halfway up the staircase and loosening the carpet to trip people.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts. He has a sudden idea and whispers to Peeves that the Bloody Baron has his own reasons for being invisible.

relationships.description: Peeves interacts with Harry by questioning him and floating in the air to squint at him.
Harry knows that the Bloody Baron has his own reasons for being invisible, which he uses as an excuse to interact with Peeves.
